## Simplify type

Flatten the type output to improve type hints shown in editors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type Simplify<T> = {
  [K in keyof T]: T[K]
}
```

## Example


```ts
type Props = { a: 1, b: 2, c: 3 } & { d: 4 }
// Expect: { a: 1, b: 2, c: 3, d: 4 }
type SimplifiedProps = Simplify<Props>
```
